channel.title: Rep Loyalty titles plz help! Rep
channel.description: Hi I just added loyalty titles everything went right but were does the character title go like where I put the number in and it shows the loyalty title where do I put that number in? Please help me thanks! I will give you rep please help thanks!

item.title: Rep Loyalty titles plz help! Rep
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

in you’re character map.
there’s something like loyalty-rank = 0 change it to a number or what int that u have made for it.
Then if u login on another account and right click on the player u will see the rank

Read full topic
item.source: Rep Loyalty titles plz help! Rep
